title: San Francisco/Civic Center-Tenderloin
name: San Francisco Ballet
address: War Memorial Opera House, 301 Van Ness Ave
hours: Box Office: M-F 10AM-4PM (10AM until start of performance on performance dates  Performances: T-Su usually 8PM or 7:30PM with Sa-Su matinee 2PM
content: The repertory season begins in January and continues through May.
